context: not opening and im trying to get help but NOBODY is helping me..I have windows 8????
response: Having Windows 8 should not cause any issues. Do you have Steam installed? If so, go into your steam folder, find the game, and run MK Launcher.exe(C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/MortalKombat_KompleteEdition/DiscContentPC/MK Launcher.exe) If this doesn't work, uninstall it and reinstall it through Steam, as sometimes the game attempts to launch before the necessary files have been downloaded.

context: Will I be able to play this game on my regular Wii?  Or do I have to have the Wii U console?
response: As others stated, Wii-U games are only playable on a Wii-U console. The Wii-U however is completely backwards compatible with all Wii titles, Wii Virtual Console titles, and Wii-Motes/Nunchucks, except a few dance games/accessories that may require the GameCube controller ports. The Wii-U is not backwards compatible with GameCube games or accessories.

context: Is there a warranty with this mouse?

context: Can you fit an HDMI cable under it? I have an A/V cable and when I try to plug an HDMI cord in it won't fit. So can you fit one under this cable?
response: You shouldn't need to use any other cable to get it to work with your TV. To answer your question, Yes there is enough room for both cable to be hooked up.

context: Does this use the classic controller?
response: No it doesn't. You can only use the Wii remote. You can either have it turned on its side, or have the nunchuck hooked up to it.

context: How far are the pedals apart? i.e. the spacing distance.
response: 4 inches. They are also at an awkward angle which is quite tasking during extended sessions.

context: This is my first time pre-ordering online. I live in Hawaii, will I get my game on the exact date of release or will you ship it on that date?
response: As long as you pre ordered like you said and either have a prime account and selected the free shipping or if no prime paid for the release date shipping you will get it on the day of release :)

context: Will this work with Windows 7?
response: I don't know. I have Windows XP.

context: How long does this take to install complete?
response: with cd 15 to 20 mins

context: work for Windows 7 Home ?
response: That's what I use, and it works just fine.

context: why do half of the people say the vita 2000 fits, and the other half say it doesn't?
response: After looking around on the web, it seems that the official description for the case states that it fits both the 1000 and 2000 models.http://www.bestbuy.com/site/insignia-vault-case-for-playstation-vita/3663009.p?id=1219092663712&skuId;=3663009&st;=categoryid$pcmcat306400050010&cp;=1&lp;=3What Amazon has may be a slightly different product, since best buy also has an identical looking case made by rocketfish.

context: Wil this work or a 87048-E14
response: Yes it will work with any wii remote,it also worked with mine

context: Is the offline mode single player only?  My son wants this game, but I'm pretty sure he will want me to play couch co-op with him if possible.
response: I'm sorry to bring the bad news but yes, playing offline mode is single player only. The only way to play together would be to play online with another system and game :(

context: Wired or Wireless? (one star reviews say they recieved wireless instead of the wired version)
response: Obviously you see the wire hanging out the back of the mouse genius

context: I really want to get this wheel since it's the cheapest force feedback option for Xbox One but the durability issues concern me. Is it worth risking?
response: I own a fanatec csw v1, a logitech g27 and the Tx, this wheel is solid, and the reliability issues they had were fixed with firmware and hardware updates since they launch it. I use it as my main wheel over the fanatec

context: Do you need to buy a controller in addition to this bundle in order to play games?
response: No, this was the best wii deal I found on internet. Go for it, I love mine.

context: Will this work on the new XBOX 1 connect?
response: No, It stinks but the Xbox one cannot compute older Xbox games. And even on the 360, Injustice can't use Kinect.

context: We would like to have a group of kids use this. Can this work?
response: it will definitely work if it's just to have the kids dance and have fun. They don't even realize they are working out :) ..not sure how you can score multiple kids though since we only have 2 controllers.

context: can you program the keys for forward and backward during web browsing?
response: Yes, you can program any of the buttons for that functionality. However, the top two buttons behind the scroll-wheel already function that way. The front one move forward, the back button moves you backward.

context: I just received this game today and found out there is no game manual. Am I the only one who is missing it?
response: I have one that came with my game, you could always just look online at one

context: So does this controller register as a Pro Controller or Classic Controller? Is it wireless?
response: It registers as a pro controller so it is only useable as a pro controller on the Wii u it's not compatible the old wii games

context: is this like a CD and you put it in the computer and all good will be able to play  or i have to install program and be online .?thanks
response: it is a dvd-rom, but u need to update the game online for a new version in Steam.

context: can you play this game on windows 8
response: yes it works fine on windows 8 :)

context: Do these cases fit the DSi XL?
response: This did NOT fit our dsi xl's.  Fortunately I was able to return it.

context: does this game have the characters that talk to you like capt. scurvy the pirate parrott
response: Yes, the characters talk, sometimes too much for me.  It is fun at other times, though.  Hope this helps.

context: Is it possible to use this controller in a PC using the microsoft receptor as previous xbox controller?
response: http://www.wpcentral.com/guide-use-xbox-one-controller-pcthis gives an unofficial step by step guide to hook an xbox one controller to a PC

context: Is the space bar much louder than any other key?
response: From memory I would have to say yes.

context: Do these headphones offer sidetone? That is, can you hear your own voice through the mic?
response: Not by them self. You would have to select it on your sound card.

context: Can this be played on windows vista 32 Bit?
response: From everything I am seeing and reading it will not run well. In some of the forums they give to tricks and twists to try but they don't sound too easy or appealing to me. I guess it boils down to how badly you want to play it. I hope this helps.

context: Is is possible to power this with a USB cord running from the PS4?
response: i dont know, mine has a power cord to teh wall, i have never tried that.

context: is it working good?
response: Yes it is working perfectly

context: Is this the game and the extras or just the extras for the game
response: The season pass only covers the answers, not the full game.  Full game sold separately

context: dose this include all the seasons or just the first
response: just the 1st one wendy!

context: How long does it take to install do you need wifi
response: no and it takes about 25 min

context: I would like to know if there is just 1 CD or if the quantity is different, just because I heard there is a version of 3 CD's
response: It's just 1 disc. Games 1 through 5 are downloadable content only, from the online Playstation store.

context: So far ive read it works on the PS4, Xbox1, PS3, and 360? Is it wireless for all systems? just plug them in the controller for sound and chat?
response: No, Xbox you need to plug in and play station is wirelless...

context: Can I download this game to a flash drive to install on another computer?
response: I don't know why not. It is about 2 Gig. I downloaded it at my cabin and then took it home on a external drive. I had no problems.

context: Can you transfer your progress on the original fallout new vegas game to this new game?
response: Yes, the ultimate edition has the original game plus a 2nd disc with all the dlc for you to download. You would be able to use the content from the original game and not lose it.
